metadata.title: CVE-2021-47216 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: advansys: Fix kernel pointer leakPointers should be printed with %p or %px rather than cast to 'unsignedlong' and printed with %lx.Change %lx to %p to print the hashed pointer.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
